Equipment Wear: Light Damage -1 to hit, damage, -1 to skill checks using the item
Moderate Damage -2 to hit, damage, -1 to skill checks using the item, 2 in 10 chance to fail.
Heavy Damage -3 to hit, damage, -2 to skill checks using the item, 2 in 6 chance of failing
Broken The device is inoperable or unusable.
Ruined The device is beyond repair and fit only for salvage.
